alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 3:08PM EST until February 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity for the following rivers in New York... West Branch Delaware At Walton affecting Delaware County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...West Branch Delaware At Walton. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Fairgrounds begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tonight and continue falling to 5.5 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
